Description: New construction! North End meets the Waterfront at this just completed boutique building, featuring six new condo quality apartments. One bedroom flats, all offering luxe kitchens with gas cooking, stainless steel appliances, Bianco Calacatta Quartz countertops, and a large island. The elegant spa baths are delightful, featuring tasteful marble mosaic flooring, polished nickel fittings, and LED lighting. Every residence features private in-unit laundry. There are hardwood floors throughout and generous bedroom. At your doorstep, the city awaits you with fine dining, coffee shops, gourmet groceries, sporting venues, arts, waterfront, and Logan Airport, minutes away.
